data.title: RV-6 & 6A
data.text:
Kit/Plans:

Van's Aircraft

14401 NE Keil Road

Aurora, OR 97002

Telephone: 503-678-6545

Fax: 503-678-6560

Email: info@vansaircraft.com

Website: http://www.vansaircraft.com

RV Aircraft Yearbook:

Available from Mark Franek

P. O. Box 815

Sparta, NJ 07871

Telephone: 201-663-3645

This is a professionally printed, hard bound book featuring the RV-3, RV-4, RV-6 and RV-6A.

Newsletters/Clubs:

RVator, available from Ken Scott, Editor

P.O. Box 160

North Plains, OR 97133

Telephone: 503-647-5117

Fax: 503-647-2206

RVBC Magazine available from Ken Hoshowski, Editor

Box 2530

Salmon Arm, B.C.

V1E 4R4, Canada

There are tapes on RV Construction available from George and Becki Orndorff

2290 W Hicks Road

Fort Worth, TX 76131-3700

Telephone: 817-439-3280

There are 10 tapes in all, covering the construction of RV aircraft from start to finish.

Articles in EAA and related publications:
